Event.Message: The Windows Search Service started.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search service is creating the new search index {Reason: %2}. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service has successfully created the new search index. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service has failed to create the new search index. Internal error <%2, %3, %4>. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HR" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiagnosticsInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service was unable to allocate memory.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service is starting up and attempting to remove the old search index {Reason: %2}. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An exception occurred in %2. Check other related Event Log messages.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service has successfully removed the old search index. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service has failed to remove the old search index. Internal error <%2,%3>. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HR" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Search Service stopped normally.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service has failed to create one or more path rules. The service will continue creating the SystemIndex search index. Debug information: <%2>. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DebugInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Event ID %2 for the Windows Search Service has been suppressed %3 time(s) since %4. This event is used to suppress Windows Search Service events that have occurred frequently within a short period of time. See Event ID %2 for further details on this event.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EventID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RepeatCount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ReferenceTime" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service failed to move Index files from %2 to %3 with the following error: <%4,%5>. This might be because the target directory is not empty, or because the SYSTEM account doesn't have write access to the target directory. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service successfully moved index files from %2 to %3. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: While rolling back the index, the Windows Search Service encountered the following error: <%4,%5>. Index files were not moved from %2 to %3. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewIndexPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Windows Search Service failed to process the list of included and excluded locations with the error <%2, %3, "%4">. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in configuration file <%2>.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The system exception %1 occurred, and will be handled. If this causes problems, contact Microsoft Product Support Services and include the stack trace in the event. %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Code" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackTrace" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A configuration error occurred.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Performance monitoring cannot be initialized for the gatherer service, because the counters are not loaded or the shared memory object cannot be opened. This only affects availability of the perfmon counters. Restart the computer.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Performance monitoring cannot be initialized for the gatherer object, because the counters are not loaded or the shared memory object cannot be opened. This only affects availability of the perfmon counters. Restart the computer.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The entry <%2> cannot be inserted into the history.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Entry" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The transaction object cannot be created.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The transaction cannot be appended to the queue. File: %2.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The transaction cannot be updated in the queue. File: %2.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The entry <%2> in the hash map cannot be updated.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Entry" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An exception occurred. ID: %2. This is an internal error. Reproduce the error with the debugger attached and enable exceptions, then contact product support. One of the components loaded in your system is bad. You may be able to avoid the problem by recreating the index.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The transaction file cannot be read.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Internal gatherer error %2 occurred. Please contact Microsoft Product Support Services.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update cannot be started because all of the content sources were excluded by site path rules, or removed from the index configuration.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update cannot be started because the content sources cannot be accessed. Fix the errors and try the update again.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Critical error %2 occurred, and the index was shut down. The system is probably low on resources. Free up resources and restart the service.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Advise Status Change failed. The system is probably low on resources. Free up resources and restart the service.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The URL <%2> cannot be crawled.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer object cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The plug-in in <%2> cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Plugin" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer service cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A document ID cannot be allocated.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A document ID cannot be freed.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A new queue file cannot be created.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The registry version does not match with the expected <%2>, or the registry cannot be accessed because the service account does not have the correct permissions. Uninstall the previous version before installing the new one.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExpectedVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The content source <%2> cannot be accessed.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer is unable to read the registry %2.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RegPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A request to start the update has been ignored because the update is already in progress or is scheduled on one or more content sources.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The status change request %2 cannot be processed.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RequestedStatusMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The index is being reset.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The index was paused.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer index resumed.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The automatic description length was adjusted from %2 to %3.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldLength" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewLength" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update for the index cannot be started because the specified content sources were not configured for updates. Add at least one content source.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: No documents were accessed because no e-mail address is specified in the content index server properties. Specify the e-mail address in the service configuration.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unvisited items cannot be deleted from the history after a full update.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The crawl was requested to be stopped.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The previous update was reset, or was otherwise interrupted. A full update of all content sources will be automatically started. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update has been delayed because a disk is full. Check the system default temp location and the drive on which search catalog is created. The system default temp location is used for creation of temporary files during crawling. If it is full, crawling pauses. If the system default temp location is full, change the location to a disk with more free space and restart the computer. Changes to the system temp location do not take effect for system services until the computer is restarted.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer property mapping file cannot be opened. The default values are being used. You may have to copy the property mapping file from the setup CD, or reinstall the application.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The automatic description encoding tag value is invalid. The gatherer is setting this value to "yes"". Fix the gthrprm.txt file.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The plug-in manager <%2> cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PluginManager" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The application cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An update cannot begin because the content source <%2> is in use by another update already in progress. The update will start as soon as all its content sources are released by updates already in progress.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="URL" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer log cannot be created.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The word breaker for language <%2> cannot be loaded.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Locale" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer is recovering after an improper shutdown. This will delay availability of gathering functions, and may result in some noncritical data loss.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer detected pages in the history during recovery that cannot be read, and repaired them. However, statistical data for some URLs may have been lost. This can be caused by restarting a computer without first shutting down Windows, or by disk failure.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search service stopped the Protocol Host process because it was consuming too many resources. A new Protocol Host process will be started. No user action is required.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Notifications for the volume %2 are not active. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The protocol handler %2 cannot be loaded. Error description: %3. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProtocolHandler" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to load protocol handler %2. Error description: %3. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProtocolHandler" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The application network access account is invalid. Update the account with a valid username and password. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The system locale has changed. Existing data will be deleted and the index must be recreated.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer files cannot be flushed, and this action cannot be completed. The gatherer will attempt to flush files again. If the problem persists, restart the service, free system resources or verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The checkpoint record cannot be updated, and this action cannot be completed. The gatherer will attempt to update the checkpoint record again. If the problem persists, restart the service, free system resources or verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer files cannot be saved, and this action cannot be completed. The gatherer will attempt to save the files again. If the problem persists, restart the service, free system resources or verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer files from the previous checkpoint cannot be restored, and this action cannot be completed. The gatherer will attempt to restore the files again. If the problem persists, restart the service, free system resources or verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The checkpoint record cannot be read, and this action cannot be completed. If the problem persists, restart the service, free system resources or verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The project cannot be initialized, because the checkpoint record cannot be read. The data structures on the disk will be reset. Verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The project cannot be initialized, because one of the checkpoint files is missing. The data structures on the disk will be reset. Check to see if someone is manually deleting files, and verify that your hardware is working properly. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The group %2\%3 contains %4 members. Groups over %5 members are not expanded. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Domain" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Account" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Users" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MaxUsers" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The local groups cache was flushed, because %2. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The gatherer did not connect to the SQLServer instance.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unable to terminate notifications normally. Restart the service or contact Product Support.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unable to initialize the filter host process. Terminating.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The filter host process could not be terminated.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge has completed for catalog %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge has been paused for catalog %2 due to error %3. It will be rescheduled later.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge cannot be started for catalog %2 due to error %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge cannot be re-started for catalog %2 due to error %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge has restarted for catalog %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An index corruption was detected in component %2 in catalog %3.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Component" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1A master merge has been paused for catalog %2 due to low disk space. The merge will be rescheduled later. Please free some disk space for indexing to continue.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1Catalog: %2. A master merge was started due to an external request.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1Catalog: %2. A master merge was started because the catalog reached the maximum number of indexes on the last level (%3).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="IndexesPerMergeLevel" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="__binLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="binary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="__binLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1Catalog: %2. A master merge was started because the expected number of documents in the catalog (%3) were indexed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExpectedDocCount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="__binLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="binary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="__binLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1Catalog: %2. The master merge was started because of internal reason number %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CatalogName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MasterMergeReason" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="__binLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="binary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="__binLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 Unable to create the query engine's first request item due to error %2. It's possible that the MSFTESQL service account is invalid or the password has expired.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="__binLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="binary" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="__binLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error ID %2 happened in Windows Search recovery stage, please restart the service. If this error persists, please recreate the index.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Phase" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The schema file <%2> cannot be copied to <%3>.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SrcFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DstFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The index cannot be initialized.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Directory location <%2> is invalid. The application configuration cannot be read. Reinstall the application.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Directory" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The update was paused because the disk <%2> is full. Free up disk space to continue crawling the index.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Directory" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The search service has detected corrupted data files in the index {id=%2}. The service will attempt to automatically correct this problem by rebuilding the index.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CorruptionId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service is being stopped because there is a problem with the indexer: %2.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The index cannot be loaded.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Performance monitoring cannot be initialized because the counters are not loaded or the shared memory object cannot be opened. Stop and restart the search service. If this error continues, reinstall the application.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Configuration directory %2 is missing, and disaster recovery must be performed. If there are existing indexes, they must be restored from the last backup. If there is no backup of index data, then delete the catalogs and recreate them.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Directory" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The registry cannot be read, possibly because the registry keys for this index are missing. You may have to delete and recreate the index %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service added catalog %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service removed index %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service cannot open the Jet property store.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service cannot create a Jet property store.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service cannot load the property store information.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows Search Service cannot initialize multi-instancing in Jet. If the application is used in a cluster environment, all applications using Jet will fail in the same group.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The noise files cannot be renamed.%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The noise file "%2"" cannot be renamed to ""%3"".%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="OldNoiseFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewNoiseFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Performance Counters could not be loaded for %1 for instance %2 %3 due to the following error: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Driver" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceNum" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Could not get performance counter registry info for %1 for instance %2 %3 due to the following error: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Driver" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceNum" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Performance counters will not be loaded because the named objects (shared memory or events) are in use for %1 for instance %2 %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Driver" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InstanceNum" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The protocol host process %2 did not respond and is being forcibly terminated {filter host process %3}. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProtocolHostProcessID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilterHostProcessID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The filter host process %2 did not respond and is being forcibly terminated. %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtraInfo" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FilterHostProcessID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
